title: King of the Castle
description: Jewel thinks it’s one last chance for adventure. Maryam and Ara think it's their only chance to escape a terrifying future.But when the women leave Castle Bloomingdell, they are captured by alien renegades with nefarious plans.It’s a battle of the sexes, and one heck of a sexy battle. But who will end up King of the Castle?
author: Treva Harte
